column1: '''Addison-Weslay''' was the company that distributed the text-adventure video games ''[[The Hobbit Software Adventure]]''<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/hobbit.html The Hobbit Software Adventure] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 16 August 2010)</ref>
column2: ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring Software Adventure]]''
column3: <ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/lotr-gameone.html The Lord of the Rings: Game One] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 26 September 2010)</ref> ''[[Shadows of Mordor|The Shadows of Mordor Software Adventure]]''<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/som.html Shadows of Mordor] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 3 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.giantbomb.com/the-shadows-of-mordor/61-16262/ Shadows of Mordor] at GiantBoomb (retrieved 3 December 2010)</ref> and [[Crack of Doom Software Adventure]]<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/crackofdoom.html Crack of Doom Software Adventure] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.mobygames.com/game/crack-of-doom Crack of Doom Software Adventure] at Moby Games (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref> in North America and Australlia.
